description:

Complete MCP server exposing all Sentry.io Tool operations to AI agents. Zero configuration needed - all 25 operations pre-built.

## ‚ö° Quick Setup

1. **Import** this workflow into your n8n instance
2. **Activate** the workflow to start your MCP server
3. **Copy** the webhook URL from the MCP trigger node
4. **Connect** AI agents using the MCP URL

## üîß How it Works

‚Ä¢ **MCP Trigger**: Serves as your server endpoint for AI agent requests
‚Ä¢ **Tool Nodes**: Pre-configured for every Sentry.io Tool operation
‚Ä¢ **AI Expressions**: Automatically populate parameters via `$fromAI()` placeholders
‚Ä¢ **Native Integration**: Uses official n8n Sentry.io Tool tool with full error handling

## üìã Available Operations (25 total)

Every possible Sentry.io Tool operation is included:

### üìÖ Event (2 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Get an event**
‚Ä¢ **Get many events**

### üêõ Issue (4 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Delete an issue**
‚Ä¢ **Get an issue**
‚Ä¢ **Get many issues**
‚Ä¢ **Update an issue**

### üè¢ Organization (4 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create an organization**
‚Ä¢ **Get an organization**
‚Ä¢ **Get many organizations**
‚Ä¢ **Update an organization**

### üîß Project (5 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create a project**
‚Ä¢ **Delete a project**
‚Ä¢ **Get a project**
‚Ä¢ **Get many projects**
‚Ä¢ **Update a project**

### üöÄ Release (5 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create a release**
‚Ä¢ **Delete a release**
‚Ä¢ **Get a release by version ID**
‚Ä¢ **Get many releases**
‚Ä¢ **Update a release**

### üîß Team (5 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create a team**
‚Ä¢ **Delete a team**
‚Ä¢ **Get a team**
‚Ä¢ **Get many teams**
‚Ä¢ **Update a team**

## ü§ñ AI Integration

**Parameter Handling**: AI agents automatically provide values for:
‚Ä¢ Resource IDs and identifiers
‚Ä¢ Search queries and filters
‚Ä¢ Content and data payloads
‚Ä¢ Configuration options

**Response Format**: Native Sentry.io Tool API responses with full data structure

**Error Handling**: Built-in n8n error management and retry logic

## üí° Usage Examples

Connect this MCP server to any AI agent or workflow:

‚Ä¢ **Claude Desktop**: Add MCP server URL to configuration
‚Ä¢ **Custom AI Apps**: Use MCP URL as tool endpoint
‚Ä¢ **Other n8n Workflows**: Call MCP tools from any workflow
‚Ä¢ **API Integration**: Direct HTTP calls to MCP endpoints

## ‚ú® Benefits

‚Ä¢ **Complete Coverage**: Every Sentry.io Tool operation available
‚Ä¢ **Zero Setup**: No parameter mapping or configuration needed
‚Ä¢ **AI-Ready**: Built-in `$fromAI()` expressions for all parameters
‚Ä¢ **Production Ready**: Native n8n error handling and logging
‚Ä¢ **Extensible**: Easily modify or add custom logic

> üÜì **[Free for community use](https://github.com/Cfomodz/community-use)!** Ready to deploy in under 2 minutes.
